ai-ne32:1.1_0: Herein, what is the means torment by taking up the meditation?
ai-ne32:2.1_0: “Right thought, the mind should be rightly understood as right thought.”
ai-ne32:2.2_0: Where the pure faults are found, but the questions are silly.
ai-ne32:2.3_0: And wherever there is no fault for being purifying, no matter what is finding fault.
ai-ne32:2.4_0: The one free from sense desires, ~ who is free in regard to the calm,
